articles.title: Jeffrey Epstein survivors call for full files to be released: "We matter now"
articles.description: Survivors of Jeffrey Epstein's abuse gathered on Capitol Hill to demand the full release of Justice Department files related to the convicted sex offender's investigation. This push for transparency comes as a House committee released over 30,000 pages of documents, many of which were already public, and amid President Trump's dismissal of the case as a "Democrat hoax." [3, 14, 15, 18, 19, 21]

articles.title: China's Xi oversees massive military parade with Putin, Kim in attendance
articles.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping hosted a large-scale military parade in Beijing, showcasing the nation's military might and new weaponry. The event was notably attended by Russian President Vladimir Putin and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un, marking an unprecedented gathering of the three leaders that observers view as a show of defiance to the West and a symbol of shifting global power dynamics. [5, 7, 8, 10, 16, 26]

articles.title: Florida to end vaccine mandates for children as state's surgeon general likens them to 'slavery'
articles.description: Florida officials have announced plans to eliminate all vaccine mandates in the state, including long-standing requirements for schoolchildren. State Surgeon General Joseph Ladapo, appointed by Governor Ron DeSantis, described the mandates as 'immoral' and akin to 'slavery,' a move that has drawn significant criticism from medical experts concerned about potential public health consequences. [2, 4, 6, 9, 11, 13]
